participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.background: I want to inspire people with my webcomic and music. I am funny. I wish I knew where I belonged in the world, but my gummy worm collection is a comfort to me. I loved reading books to my younger siblings, and we would all pretend to be the characters in the story. I love to swim, and began at a young age.

participant_2.name: Jessica
participant_2.background: I loved to ride my bike in the countryside with my dad. I love to sew. My most valuable thing is my collection of Celtics memorabilia. I often spend hours researching vintage cars online. I am a marketing manager who is always on the go and needs to keep my energy up with lots of caffeine and cigarettes.

content.text: Hey there! I see you are a marketing manager. What do you like about your job?
Hi! I like the fast pace and the ability to use my creativity.
That's great! I wish I knew what I wanted to do with my life.
I'm interested in a lot of things, but I'm not sure what I'm good at.
Well, what are you good at?
I'm good at reading and writing, and I'm funny.
That's a great idea! I've always wanted to do that.
You should do it! I'm sure you'd be great at it.
Thanks for the encouragement! I'll start working on it right away.
That's great! I can't wait to see it.
Me too! Thanks for talking to me.
No problem! Have a great day!
